pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:6.5: “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva vūpasameti na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:7.1: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:7.5: ‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva vūpasamessati na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karissatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:7.8: ‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva vūpasameti na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karotī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:7.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:7.13: ‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva vūpasamessati na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:7.14: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:7.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā—‘ehāyye, imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī’ti vuccamānā—‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vūpasameyya na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ kareyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:11.2: cattāri adhikaraṇāni— vivādādhikaraṇaṃ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:15.3: “Neva vūpasamessāmi na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:16.1: Upasampannāya upasampannasaññā adhikaraṇaṃ neva vūpasameti na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:16.2: Upasampannāya vematikā adhikaraṇaṃ neva vūpasameti, na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:16.3: Upasampannāya anupasampannasaññā adhikaraṇaṃ neva vūpasameti, na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:17.1: Anupasampannāya adhikaraṇaṃ neva vūpasameti, na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
